sqlQuery.name: get_sequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT tas.sequence FROM DoTS.TranslatedAASequence tas WHERE tas.aa_sequence_id = $srcfeature_id

sqlQuery.name: lowcomplexity:seg
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT lc.aa_feature_id feature_id, 'lowcomplexity' type, 'seg' source, 'low complexity region' name, '.' score, lc.aa_sequence_id parent_id, aal.start_min startm, aal.end_max end, '.' strand, 'Sequence=' || substr(aas.sequence, aal.start_min, (aal.end_max-aal.start_min+1)) atts FROM dots.LowComplexityAAFeature lc, dots.AALocation aal, dots.AASequence aas WHERE lc.aa_feature_id = aal.aa_feature_id and lc.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id and aal.start_min <= $rend and aal.end_max >= $base_start and lc.aa_sequence_id = $srcfeature_id ORDER BY aal.start_min
